title: Ticket #2657: Add ~/.condor/condor_config as default config location
description: In order to make it easier for individual users to setup and run a personal Condor, we will add ~/.condor/condor_config to the list of locations Condor will search for a configuration file. This allows a user to configure a personal Condor without administrator privileges and without having to ensure the CONDOR_CONFIG variable is always set.
